title: Bluefield Partners Passes Funds Under Management Milestone
text:
Bluefield Partners Passes Funds Under Management Milestone
Bluefield Partners confirms it now administers over $6 billion in client funds.
Shenzhen, China, August 31, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Bluefield Partners, the Shenzen, China-headquartered broker-dealer and wealth manager has confirmed that it now manages funds in excess of $6 billion on behalf of clients. The firm made the announcement at an investor symposium in Hong Kong.
Naveen Chawla, Chief Investment Officer at Bluefield Partners said that the milestone marked the firm’s transition to upper-quartile wealth manager status in the Asia Pacific region.
“The passing of this milestone places us in rarified company in our region. The fact that we’ve achieved this as a local practice rather than as a subsidiary of a larger US or European parent makes it all the more satisfying,” he said.
The firm has developed extensive relationships with primary broker/dealers in the US and Europe and has developed innovative products that have been warmly received by a burgeoning Chinese middle-class with money to invest but it is the inroads it has made into the Asia-Pacific institutional investor segment of the market that has provided much of the boost to its funds under management.
“The fantastic performance on both the Hang Seng Index and the Shanghai Composite this year has seen a surge in interest among retail and institutional investors alike and Bluefield Partners has been well-placed to tap into that demand,” added Chawla.
Bluefield Partners says it will continue to innovate in product development while ensuring that clients can still gain full access to new and exciting stock floatations in both domestic and foreign jurisdictions.
About Bluefield Partners:
Bluefield Partners was established in 2005. We are headquartered in Shenzhen, China with presence in Beijing, Shanghai and Hong Kong.
Bluefield Partners functions as a privately held Investment Counseling and Advisory firm. We render investment and advisory services for individuals, trusts and charities who want their wealth managed professionally. Portfolios are tailored for each client on an individual basis. We are committed to enhancing your wealth and protecting your future.
